content: I'm actually thinking of getting some storage bins to keep my shoes organized. Since I recently rearranged my bedroom, I have a lot more space to move around now, and I'm excited to make the most of it. Speaking of which, I started decluttering my closet today, sorting out my clothes into three piles: keep, donate, and discard. Do you think storage bins would work well for my shoes, or are there other options I should consider?
